title: [Diamond 2- Toplaner] Suche ein serious Team
body:
Hi im looking for a serious Team which contains D4+ Players only

about me:

- I was 3 Years long a OTP and i still mainly play Irelia but i have at least 4-5 champs which i can play on D2+ Level
- I am 21 y/o 
- I can speak German and Englisch pretty fluent
- My peak League was Master Tier 200 lp in S5 when Irelia was permabanned (I got to that Rank playing Sion zzrot only lol)
- im open to learn new champs and my TeamQ rank is Dia2 mmr

MSG me on Cruel Cørvus
